content.text:
Let me analyze the task and provide a detailed solution:

Target Structure Analysis:
- Total Blocks: 6 blocks
- Layers: 2 layers
- Colors: Red, Yellow, Blue
- Structure: Arched base with blocks stacked on top

Block Selection from Dictionary:
Required blocks by index:
1. Red arch block (index 1 or 2) - base
2. Yellow rectangular block (index 15) - middle horizontal layer
3. Yellow cube block (index 11) - top left
4. Blue cube block (index 7) - top right

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (another red arch)
    Step3: Move block with index 15 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step4: Move block with index 11 (yellow cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 7 (blue cube)
}

This sequence will recreate the target structure exactly, using blocks from the dictionary with their precise orientations and colors.
